root.name: Mugen Souls Z
root.description: OverviewMugen Souls Z is the sequel to Mugen Souls, and features a new main character, Shirma, as well as two other side characters, Nao and Ace.The game was originally published by Compile Heart in Japan in April 2013. It has been licensed for release in North America and Europe by NIS America, and is due out in 2014.StoryShirma, who is a god like the previous heroine Chou-Chou, is discovered sleeping by Nao and suffers from memory loss. She must try to control the twelve worlds while evading the god hunter Ace.GameplayCharactersChou-chouShirmaNaoAce
